specials.name: Ranged
specials.description: kukri +14 (agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+6 piercing

specials.name: Hidden Blade
specials.description: Frequency once per round; Effect The cultist draws a weapon and then Strikes with it. The target of the Strike is flat-footed against the attack

specials.name: Channel Smite
specials.description: The cultist expends a prepared harm spell and makes a melee Strike. Instead of the normal effect of the spell, its negative damage is added to the Strike’s damage.

specials.name: Sneak Attack
specials.description: The cultist deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

specials.name: Death’s Call (R)
specials.description: Frequency once per day Trigger A living creature within 20 feet of you dies, or an undead creature within 20 feet of you is destroyed. Effect:  The cultist gains temporary Hit Points equal to the triggering creature's level plus 4. If the triggering creature was undead, double the number of temporary Hit Points they gain.
